name: Project SURVIVE
description: Legal Aid to help your understand worker's right while individuals are in vulnerable situations that deal with personal safety.
fullDescription: Legal Aid to help your understand worker's right while individuals are in vulnerable situations that deal with personal safety.
whatTheyOffer: We protect the rights of survivors of domestic violence, sexual assault, and stalking to keep their jobs, take time off, and obtain accommodations while seeking safety or medical or legal help. We represent low-wage workers, provide community education, and advocate for policy change to expand survivors’ workplace rights. We provide free confidential legal advice through our Survive Helpline.
howToGetIt: For workers in California, call (415) 404-9093 to schedule a clinic appointment. Depending on location, the Workers’ Rights Clinic near you may provide legal consultations over the phone only.
